scenario.title: The Surprise Party Dilemma
scenario.context: At a local bakery on a sunny afternoon
scenario.description: Two friends, Alex and Sam, are planning a surprise party for their mutual friend, Kelly. They disagree about whether to invite Kelly's ex, who is still part of their wider friend group.
scenario.speaker2_persona_1: High EQ - Emotionally intelligent, calm, thoughtful
scenario.speaker2_persona_high: High EQ - Emotionally intelligent, calm, thoughtful

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: So, what do you think about inviting Kelly's ex to the party?

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: I think we should invite him. He's still part of our friend group, isn't he?

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: Yeah, but their breakup was pretty messy. I'm worried it might make Kelly uncomfortable.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: I see your point, but we should also consider how excluding him might affect the dynamics of our friend group.

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: That's a valid point, I didn't think about it that way. This is a tough decision.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: Maybe we could talk to him first and see how he feels about it?
